column2: Kagro in the Morning is LIVE at 9 AM ET!
column5: Well I understand there was a big speech last night. And that it went pretty much as expected! Which is usually the case with these things except we usually have Greg Dworkin with us the day after in the role of guy-who-watched-the-speech. I couldn’t even watch people watching it on Twitter as I usually do. But luckily for us Twitter more or less repeats itself for anywhere between a couple of hours to a full day so I’m thinking I’ll catch up before too long. Besides there’s always plenty of unexpected fodder out there as well. You never know where the day may lead. Like your home could be raided by the FBI for instance! Perhaps because you are a villainous traitor or some such. Just hypothetically. By way of example. I mean that probably didn’t happen to anybody we know yesterday right? Listen right here at 9:00 AM ET! Even more ways to listen live or by podcast below the fold. Ways to Listen to Kagro in the Morning: Your options to listen LIVE: And here’s a new tip: If the player hiccups or drops the audio between the shows just go ahead and stop and restart it and things should go smoothly after that. If you miss the show or just can't listen live you can: Things you can do to support the show: Thanks for all your support and enjoy the show!
